description:
Schwarz Bruder fights the Viking Gundam, easily defeating it. Domon`s next opponent, Kyral Mekirel, is an assassin who has one all of his matches by default by killing his opponents before the matches.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dans la ligne de mire ! Le Gundam Fighter assassin
Domon im Visier! Der Stab des Killers
Nerawareta Domon! Koroshiya Fighter no Hissatsu Ken
狙われたドモン! 殺し屋ファイターの必殺剣
